mapper.select: SELECT A.ID AS ID, A.PLANCODE AS PLANCODE, A.WZCODE AS WZCODE, A.MODELSPCIFICATION AS MODELSPCIFICATION, A.WZNAME AS WZNAME, A.SPNUM AS SPNUM, A.SPPRICE AS SPPRICE, A.UNIT AS UNIT, A.SYNUM AS SYNUM FROM WMDB.WM_PLANLIST A INNER JOIN WMDB.WM_PLAN B ON A.PLANCODEID = B.ID WHERE A.SYNUM != '0' AND B.FLAG = 'E' AND A.FLAG = 'E' AND B.SPCODE = '99'

SELECT A.BUYPRICE FROM WMDB.WM_BUYLIST A INNER JOIN WMDB.WM_BUY B ON A.BUYCODEID = B.ID WHERE B.SPCODE = '99' AND B.SPJSDATE IS NOT NULL AND A.WZCODE = #{wzcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.SPJSDATE >= #{halfYearStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.FLAG = 'E' AND A.FLAG = 'E' ORDER BY B.SPJSDATE DESC, A.PLANCODE DESC

SELECT Sum( cast ) AS BQEND, Sum( cast ) AS BQENDMONEY FROM WMDB.WM_STOCK WHERE WMDB.WM_STOCK.TRANFLAG IS NULL AND WMDB.WM_STOCK.STOCKYEARMON IS NULL AND WMDB.WM_STOCK.WZCODE = #{wzcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
